very good game i recommend it

Great game with high skill ceiling, overall if you want a game to grind this is it. Without skins, rank, or any type of reward system the game would still be rewarding just as you get better and destroy your opponents but the in game loot drops and desire to rank up make it impossible to quit. Worth every penny and every second.
